espacios.name: Juan Amaya
espacios.comment: About the knowledge the student brings as a motivation for the development of the subject.

espacios.name: Ana Bossa
espacios.comment: From the concepts constructed by the students at the first moment either in group or individual, each student using their skills of analysis, deduction, reflection, problem solving, research, synthesis (mental processes)represents and communicates their own concepts from their own learning experience.

espacios.name: Carmen D√≠az
espacios.comment: After socialization, and starting from the learning situation and knowledge evidenced by the students; we translate that knowledge and those contents with other related areas.

espacios.name: Carmen D√≠az
espacios.comment: Students after the development process are able to create concepts related to oriented theory.

espacios.name: Carmen D√≠az
espacios.comment: It is the final test element of oriented learning (achievements, indicators of achievement and competencies).
